Reviews.Title: more than i expected
Reviews.Author: Horror FreakNess
Reviews.Content: My son is having a ball watching all of the cartoons offered by this app. I thought it was going to be like so many similar apps with not enough choices or the channels cannot be picked up. My son's watching full episodes of Spongebob and Courage the Cowardly Dog puts much more. Gets a thumbs up from me

Reviews.Title: love this is the best one that does not skip
Reviews.Author: starcrazy11      This is a great app when you...
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for the right app for your kids this is the one for you and them I got it and was very happy to have this now my child loved it

Reviews.Title: Great one
Reviews.Author: M. Taw
Reviews.Content: This app is perfect, exactly what i want for my kids. They enjoyed it a lot. Thanks for the free app.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: A free app of cartoons. Wish I didn't need Internet for the app but still nice little app for your kids.

Reviews.Title: reliabilty or lack of
Reviews.Author: Kauai
Reviews.Content: This app plays for a while then the entire app crashes.  I have yet to be able to watch all of different show or even the episodes in just one show.  Playing it on kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: frendly interface
Reviews.Author: MrCat
Reviews.Content: Great. Finally got app to watch cartoons for  with frepiendly interface and HD episodes. And not thrum web browser. like it.

Reviews.Title: App got stuck "on"
Reviews.Author: jdkf
Reviews.Content:
I was using this app on my kindle fire HD and went to quit the app and couldn't. I tried closing it, I tried opening other apps on top of it, I even tried putting the kindle in sleep mode to exit this app, and it kept right on playing.
The only thing that allowed me to stop this app was shutting down the kindle all the way and rebooting it.

Reviews.Title: Where's Spongebob?
Reviews.Author: Ramon Hernandez "Ramon Hernandez"
Reviews.Content: I bought this app because I wanted to watch Spongebob, just Spongebob but after I downloaded it and checked out looked for Spongebob but found only found other tv shows. The picture of the app haves Spongebob along with other shows so I'm expecting Spongebob but other than that kid friendly and lots of other shows.

Reviews.Title: Bit Disappointing
Reviews.Author: I'm a Potato! "~Cakie"
Reviews.Content: Honestly, I got this app because I wanted to watch Kim Possible again. I loved that show. But, the episodes wouldn't show up for it. So, I tried other shows. When I tapped on an episode to watch it, it wouldn't work. Not for any video. I was very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Warning: Videos are pulled from YouTube and not all of them are actually for kids.
Reviews.Author: Remaking June
Reviews.Content: While 99% of the videos are safe - I've had one or two listed that were not actually for kids. This pulls videos from YouTube so we've had a few of the lame 'live readings' where people just talk over the video. My 3 year old was watching one this morning that had a few bad words in it. Be careful with this app.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: emiddleton29
Reviews.Content: I love this app for my two daughters. It is perfect for the 2 year old and the 7 year old.

Reviews.Title: Keeps my child busy...
Reviews.Author: Crystal Robinson
Reviews.Content: This app is easy to work and navigate, but it needs more of a selection of programs for children to watch.

Reviews.Title: dora guy talking in background
Reviews.Author: kedron
Reviews.Content: there is a guy talking in the background on Dora that is very inappropriate!  I don't want my kids to listen to some guy tell his kid he doesn't like them. I will be Be getting rid of this app.

Reviews.Title: love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jemilyn Slone
Reviews.Content: My kids love it!!!! Definitely a life saver whenever they start start to get bored:). And the old cartoons rule!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: best kid show app ever
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: my daughter is 3 and loves the selection of shows she can watch 24/7 on momma's phone. i love that they are good shows and full length episodes. that rocks!

Reviews.Title: prettycool!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It's a neat app but need WiFi steaming to use it. Can't use it on a plane or taxi ride to entertain my kid

Reviews.Title: excellent app
Reviews.Author: dustin
Reviews.Content: Great app that gives my lil girls access to their favorite shows at all times of the day. Thanks for the peace and quiet that it provides to a mom and dad.

Reviews.Title: One great app to have!!!!!
Reviews.Author: lisa kidd
Reviews.Content: This app is a must to have if you have kids or grandkids. My grand daughter absolutly loves picking out a show and watching it!!

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: contreras
Reviews.Content:
Awsome kid shows especially ms. Bean.I would recommend this app to little kids.It really entertains you.
All of these shows are great like curious gorge, ms.bean, the pink panther, pocoyo, elmo, spongbob, phineas and pherb, tom and jerry kim impossible and many more!

Reviews.Title: Great Kindle App
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: My daughter got this for her Kindle Fire and it has several shows that I loved as a kid.  Some of which I have not been able to find on the Amazon Prime video list.  It is lots of fun to watch the shows.

Reviews.Title: Love!!!
Reviews.Author: I guess this app is okay. What I don't like a...
Reviews.Content: I have to admit that I Iove this app and I'm 15.  It has power puff girls, Spongebob, Tom and Jerry. LAST but not least they have every show that I use to watch when I was younger.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Content: The only reason I GOT that app was because I thought spongebob was on there but it wasn't they showed it on the picture though. They got my hopes up because they took spongebob of Netflix and that's the only free way to watch your favorite episodes.

Reviews.Title: Would Not Work For Me
Reviews.Author: mchinca
Reviews.Content: Could not really say how great the app was as it would not work once I installed the app.  Looked like it would have been fun to watch some of the older stuff.

Reviews.Title: Love IT....
Reviews.Author: Michelle Scott
Reviews.Content: My grandkids LOVE  Free Kids Tv....It's a great App for both parents and grandparents to download for kids to ENJOY..

Reviews.Title: not all shows are available to watch
Reviews.Author: TWood
Reviews.Content: half the shows listed don't have anything to watch. your click to watch pocoyo and nothing is there same with many others

Reviews.Title: absolutely love it!!
Reviews.Author: ceejaysgoodies
Reviews.Content: Oh my God! I love this app I have it on my kindle fire and there shows that I remembered since I was a kid! I totally recommended to anyone who loves cartoons! :-)

Reviews.Title: Install With Caution
Reviews.Author: Deer Creek Family
Reviews.Content: I would be hesitent to install this app. Main menu has advertising that looks like a message from the app but takes you to sponsored sites. I only hope it didn't install any spying bugs onto my kindle.

Reviews.Title: Issue
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content:
I have the samsung note 3 and the picture is TINY and my son can't see anything when a video plays.  Has this happened to anyone, and if so, how did you fix it?
I'm giving it two stars because if it worked, the concept is good.

Reviews.Title: rating
Reviews.Author: dimples
Reviews.Content: I like free kids TV app because it has a wide variety toi choose from and so far my boys have been very entertained and fascinated by it

Reviews.Title: Baby Looney toons??? where are they
Reviews.Author: marioaragon
Reviews.Content: It doesn't even have baby Looney toons that's my babies favorite show and I downloaded the app for that reason and its blank !!!

Reviews.Title: Super slow download.
Reviews.Author: the best reviewer
Reviews.Content: I can not get on the app because it is a very long download. I am disappointed that I can not watch my shows. Is this a bug? I would rate it 5 stars if it would not take a long time.

Reviews.Title: Grand Kidsd Love Free Kids TV
Reviews.Author: Betty Johnson
Reviews.Content: my grand kids love the Free Kids TV. Thanks for having such good  kids programs. The free App is great.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Show Selection!
Reviews.Author: michelle suggs
Reviews.Content: Very nice! Great selection of shows my kids love! Couldn't believe Ninja Turtles and Flintstones were on there! Spongebob was only one I was disappointed not to find.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: jerry
Reviews.Content: privides hours and hours of entertainment for the kids at home.... as long as you have unlimited internet it is great i would say....

Reviews.Title: Nice Free
Reviews.Author: F. Cantrelle
Reviews.Content: My 2yr son loves it and uses a lot, not bad for a free app and its better than searching for videos.

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: rtcg
Reviews.Content: First of all it is episodes for.6 yearolds and it.is not even a episode because itnis 5 miniutes of the shownand Ps inknow you might not know this but you are being tracked BE CAREFULL good luck

Reviews.Title: it has good car toons
Reviews.Author: jim
Reviews.Content: good for boys and gurles my g-kids love the toons on it ,and I like looking with tham ,it is a good one to have

Reviews.Title: best tv game ever LOL
Reviews.Author: v. last name
Reviews.Content: this game is the best cause when I go to sleep I can watch curios George and fall asleep really quick!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Danita
Reviews.Content: My Son is always on this app. Everything is there and I don't have to go on the internet to find shows!

Reviews.Title: loved all the selections in this app
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: My 3 yr old and five yr old pull up new movies and games every day.  So much to choose from. We will continue to use and enjoy.

Reviews.Title: lost for words
Reviews.Author: Baby girl
Reviews.Content: Where are the cartoon? Seems to have a mind of its own. Over half of the cartoons are missing. What a disappointment for the little one's. Please fix the bugs in this app! Screen is blank nothing to see but darkness. Help grandchild cry for the cartoons .  Tried of seeing nothing on the screen but would you like for the app to close. I guess it should close there nothing there. My grandchild would have a big smile if could see this app.

Reviews.Title: WHERE IS IT?
Reviews.Author: ann
Reviews.Content: I DON'T WANT TO SAY I HATE IT, I CAN'T FIND WHERE IT WENT. I HAVEN'T EVEN BEEN ABLE TO TRY IT OUT.

Reviews.Title: Great app for kids video
Reviews.Author: Vishnu
Reviews.Content: This is really a great app for kids free video. Only problem is some of the videos won't load. Worth it.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Norma L. Priddy
Reviews.Content: So far my great grand daughter hasn't seen this, but I just downloaded it & checked out one of the cartoons & I think she'll like it a lot.

Reviews.Title: best for kids and mom
Reviews.Author: amylou
Reviews.Content: There are a lot of different shows for kids to choose from, especially the older shows that I remember from my childhood. I love the Disney cartoon selection and so do my boys. They can also choose some of their newer favorites, but we have had this app for over a year now and it has yet to be updated with newer episodes. I like it SO MUCH MORE than UTUBE or something like that because all shows offered are safe for kids and shows I would let them watch.... even though I still supervise which shows they pick. Oh I have three boys ages 18 months, 4, and 14 and they all like it.

Reviews.Title: what to spect it is free.
Reviews.Author: outdoor 345
Reviews.Content: my doter love the TV but after play all the magic school bus she can not see the magic school bus no more/??????

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: jenni
Reviews.Content:
Good for kids
The will love it this is just awesome I like it some old cartoons and new it is good

Reviews.Title: kids tv
Reviews.Author: Doodledog
Reviews.Content: Brilliant app, best one l've found for kids tv. kids love watching it and there's plenty of choice to keep them both happy. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Spongebob is pictured but cannot be found anywhere on app.
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: It is a great little app for keeping my daughter busy in the car or elsewhere. However Spongebob is shown in the picture but nowhere to be found on the actual app. That disappoints my daughter as having Spongebob was the main reason for downloading the app.

Reviews.Title: Got it for my great niece!
Reviews.Author: Renae Riggs
Reviews.Content: She loves it!  I got while she was with me for the weekend!  It kept her attention very well!  I end up letting my niece know so she could get it also!

Reviews.Title: cute shows
Reviews.Author: Delphine Kahler
Reviews.Content: Has many of the original Donald Duck cartoons.  Other good selections for younger children. Easy to use for any age.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Lesmeek
Reviews.Content: I got this app for my children. They love watching the shows that are here. The shows keep my daughter very entertained.

Reviews.Title: childhood shows,
Reviews.Author: Andrea Watson
Reviews.Content: my kids and I enjoy watching a lot of the shows from my childhood. and we love that there are lot of the Pbs shows

Reviews.Title: Old shows
Reviews.Author: Sierra
Reviews.Content: I only like it cause it has old TV channels that you can't find anywhere else it cool I like it

Reviews.Title: Could be Great App
Reviews.Author: BA "BA"
Reviews.Content: Will list shows to watch then has no episodes. Can't get Calliou at all. Other shows have one or two short episodes.  This could work so much better. It's a great idea.

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: nia
Reviews.Content: After reading all of the other reviews I thought that this would be a good app but it just keeps stopping and stuttering every 4 seconds and although it has lots of tv shows u can't really watch them

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work right...closes automatically
Reviews.Author: Veronica L Smith
Reviews.Content: Everytime after I open up the app and scroll to the bottom of the list to view the shows available, the app would close automatically. I could never get it to work. There is also some shows, (such as Pink Panther) that shows the cartoon picture on the app icon, but the show is not listed as one available to watch.

Reviews.Title: no parental controls
Reviews.Author: wbtr1007
Reviews.Content: The only reason I got this was because it said I could control which shows my 3 year old daughter could watch.  The option isn't even there. And the favorites doesn't show any selected favorites at all.  It has a great selection but that's only a quarter of the reason I got this for my daughter.

Reviews.Title: Poor
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: Had a lot of my sons favorite shoes on the app but the video quality was horrible. I deleted it.

Reviews.Title: Needs a strong Wi-Fi
Reviews.Author: Amber Willson
Reviews.Content: Some of the cartoons don't load or skip a lot.  You will need a strong wi-fi connection or your child will be sadly disappointed because the cartoons won't work.

Reviews.Title: not the best app
Reviews.Author: raykt
Reviews.Content: It doesn't work well the app did not even have all the shows it claimed it would,so my siblings can only watch kim possible,Johnny test,ninja turtles,and anamaniacs,but the shows that did work played at a great quality without much buffering.

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed!
Reviews.Author: Tracy Malko
Reviews.Content: It indicates it is compatible for my android device and downloads fine but then the videos are unable to play for some reason :-(

Reviews.Title: some.cartoons were not writing
Reviews.Author: irene bee
Reviews.Content: Some of the cartoons were not running as they should be.like  Dora the explorer they're all in Spanish and the episodes were a total rip off

Reviews.Title: free kids tv
Reviews.Author: Jovan Davis
Reviews.Content: I love this app me and my so watch it daily daily give it five stars very good app and shows

Reviews.Title: Kids tv
Reviews.Author: Leslie
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter loves this free kids TV on my Kindle she's watching it all the time it keeps her busy.

Reviews.Title: So many titles.
Reviews.Author: kks
Reviews.Content: My 8 year old loves this. So many of her faviorate characters on here. Very easy for her to choose what she wants on her own.

Reviews.Title: free kids tv
Reviews.Author: watts
Reviews.Content: Really like this app, shows a lot of today's and earlier cartoons and shows.  My grandchildren really love watching their favorites on here!

Reviews.Title: ANOTHER, MUST HAVE, 4 KINDLE FIRE GEN1 KIDS!!!!
Reviews.Author: EZSEEK "Life is EZ, when you SEEK!.™"

Reviews.Title: great option
Reviews.Author: liz
Reviews.Content: my girls love this. i just wish it had the option of playing without internet so we could travel with it

Reviews.Title: Skip this one
Reviews.Author: dam81
Reviews.Content: The only thing that works properly on this app are the ads...and there are WAY too many.  I couldn't get a single show (which, by the way, are mostly clips) to play.  This is just ad-ware designed to look like a TV app for kids.  Terrible!

Reviews.Title: it would not let me use the app my kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content:
this is a sucky app
you guys need to do a better job and makenit so ky kindle fire can do it

Reviews.Title: Great app for kids
Reviews.Author: FishingMomma
Reviews.Content: I got this for my 3 yr.old. She loves it. You have a lot of shows from her fav characters on tv, and shows she's never seen. Great nursery ryhme song shows as well.

Reviews.Title: Tv
Reviews.Author: E.Coleman
Reviews.Content: I think this is a great way for children to watch Tv so when the Tv goes out you can get this app

Reviews.Title: pretty good cartoons
Reviews.Author: Heather Pofferberger
Reviews.Content: My children like this.  They watch these pretty frequently and seem to enjoy them.  Pink Panther is one of their favorite cartoons!

Reviews.Title: grate
Reviews.Author: jennifer becker "jennie111585"
Reviews.Content: My nephew loves it. He likes to watch a variety of cartoons. But he likes this app the best. There is a lot to choose from. Thanks for making such a good app

Reviews.Title: Best I've downloaded yet.
Reviews.Author: ceil46038
Reviews.Content: 3 yr old grandson loves all the choices and even though he may not care about a lot of the shows, he'll watch his favorites over and over.  Lot of variety.

Reviews.Title: great for kids, but not complete!
Reviews.Author: Nikhil Verghese "Nik"
Reviews.Content: this app do not have all the shows from the series'that are given. but i do enjoy seeing my kids having so much fun!

Reviews.Title: My Granddaughter
Reviews.Author: Sharon Banning
Reviews.Content: My Granddaughter just loves the cartoons you offer for free. Being a disabled Vet I sure appreciate it b/c I can't afford some of the ridiculous prices of some of the stuff.

Reviews.Title: stopping?!
Reviews.Author: A. Dski
Reviews.Content: I downloaded this app with the notion that the episodes would be downloadable for anytime viewing. Wrong! Now the episodes dont show up and if they do the entire app shuts down. Disappointed

Reviews.Title: has to keep reloading by itself to work
Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: I downloaded this for my younger siblings it worked great for a while now it doesn't work. I guess that is why it's free. I recommend that you should not get this app.

Reviews.Title: okay, nice that it is free
Reviews.Author: ilikegooddeals
Reviews.Content: The best part about it is it free.  The negative is that there isn't a whole lot that my daughter is interested in.  I guess watching youtube videos are the best.

Reviews.Title: sucks
Reviews.Author: great
Reviews.Content: This tv app doesn't give u full episodes. And doesn't give u old shows like thats so raven or even steven

Reviews.Title: disappear
Reviews.Author: raven
Reviews.Content: I love this app except after you watch all of the episodes they start to disappear until you have none left.

Reviews.Title: Love the old school cartoons
Reviews.Author: Angelica Talbert "Angie"
Reviews.Content: My daughter watches her curious George everyday on here as well as Caliou. I love the cartoons as well you will be sure to find Kim possible, power puff girls and Dexter 's laboratory just to name a few. Great app.

Reviews.Title: must have app w/ kids
Reviews.Author: Kris
Reviews.Content: This wonderful kids app has some classic and current cartoons to stream. Plenty to chose from, phin n fern to classic Looney tunes. Hours to watch!

Reviews.Title: keeps crashing
Reviews.Author: thegreat1
Reviews.Content: Every time I scroll to view all of the offered tv programs the app closes automatically. It seems all the people using kindle fire hd are experiencing the same issue.

Reviews.Title: Free kids tv
Reviews.Author: Nikki Simpson
Reviews.Content: The shows freeze up & are not available most of the time we try to use this ap. Would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: not very many cartoons
Reviews.Author: Carol Jones
Reviews.Content: the older cartoons are good but for the child cartoons there is only like one or two episodes and that doesnt entertain a five year old for very long.

Reviews.Title: I hope they improve this app. It could potentially be a great thing.
Reviews.Author: Tina Zeigler
Reviews.Content: This would be a good thing.  There are too few shows for each character and the shows that are there are only a few minutes.  This is a very good idea.  I hope they expand this app.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dalila
Reviews.Content: I recommend  this app  for who has kids of 3 years old like mine is excellent helper so bueno buenisimo lol

Reviews.Title: three little ones give it 5 stars
Reviews.Author: Melissa R. Craven
Reviews.Content:
Great entertainment for the nieces when they visit, it opens easily and there are a number of toons for them to
bounce around to!!

Reviews.Title: Good Clean Cartoons
Reviews.Author: jules
Reviews.Content: These old cartoons, and the ones that teach and aren't 'mechanical' or groce and creepy are SO much better for kids than the far-out ones they have today. Plus the old ones like Bugs Bunny and Pink Panther are better than the computerized Garfield. His old ones are best!

Reviews.Title: No device that it works with?
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I own 5 different devices and not one of them is compatible with this app?  Great idea, and would love to check it out.  I have an ASUS, Samsung, Motorola Droid and 2 generic devices.  Not one works with this????

Reviews.Title: Love this app!!!
Reviews.Author: Jensen
Reviews.Content: Great app that kids really enjoy! A lot of shows and options that are great for spare time. Worked great from the start.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Lesha
Reviews.Content: Love this app. Didn't think it would really work, but my kids love it, esp when on road. I just wish ducktales would work, one of my faves as a kid.

Reviews.Title: great cartoons
Reviews.Author: Susan-lyn Gonzales-gasparrelli "susanlyn  Gas...
Reviews.Content: Even I love cartoons, they have some great cartoons, I love them!!!! Kids will enjoy, for sure.... AWESOME!!!  LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Sucks
Reviews.Author: Jamari Moody
Reviews.Content: Man this is **** man.This sucks nobody should never ever get this cheap thing.It does not have real episodes.like sponge Bob guy screams chocolate for 1 hour.I want the full episode.whoever made this up sucks.
